Well, she was an amazing woman,

She died.
After my mom died, I'd been on autopilot.
I just, like, did what I needed to do to pass the bar, get through law school,
made a lot of money for my firm, and I was slowly dying inside.
And if I wanted to even do honor to my mother's memory
and what she wanted for me,
I couldn't keep just playing it safe.
I don't want it to be about making money. I really don't care about that.
Like, none of that shit matters.
I want my life to be about serving other people,
